PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-07792014-06-13,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN
ActNational Energy Board Act
PrecisAppointment of PETER WATSON of Sherwood Park, Alberta, to be a member of the National Energy Board, to hold office during good behaviour, on a full-time basis, for a term of seven years; and designation of PETER WATSON as Chairman of the National Energy Board, for a term of seven years, effective August 18, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
